name: 8-Bit Idol
description:
A rhythm game where you press the arrows in time with the music.  The better you play, the better your score will be when the song ends! 

This game is made for a weekly prototype project with "sound" as its theme. 

Note: Support Darnu-Pop on Youtube for this amazing 8-bit track. *I do not own this soundtrack and I don't make money for this. This is for a simple project. Credit goes all towards the creator.*
